amendment.description: Amendment changes section 5 (transportation fringe benefits) to authorize increasing the transit portion of the transportation fringe benefit so it is equal to the maximum limit of the parking portion of the transportation fringe benefit.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-734 to amend section 5 (transportation fringe benefits) to authorize increasing the transit portion of the transportation fringe benefit so it is equal to the maximum limit of the parking portion of the transportation fringe benefit.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. McGovern.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
